name: Elder Puzzle
description:
Elder Puzzle - A puzzle game with classic game modes, dozens of levels and beautiful pictures made in the pixel-art style, in this game you can train your quick thinking and reaction, collecting puzzles into a single picture, choosing the difficulty level for your style of play.

A colorful puzzle game where you collect puzzle pieces into a coherent picture, go through dozens of levels and choose your level of difficulty, each of which is limited by its own time and amount of life. Train your brains!

Game features:
- Choice of levels
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Choice of difficulty modes
